testCase.name: Products component should call on press when tapped
Products component should call on press when tapped
Product Details component should hide add to cart button once it is clicked
Product Details component should increase the quantity when + button is clicked
Product Details component should decrease the quantity when - button is clicked
Cart component show empty cart when there are no items added
Cart component should navigate to product details on tapping cart item
Cart component should increase the quantity when + button is clicked
Cart component should decrease the quantity when - button is clicked
Products component show loading when products is empty
Products component tapping on a product should navigate to product details
